column17:
Fendi Life Essence Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Men) Price: Rs.1199

Life Essence by Fendi is a Oriental Spicy fragrance. Launched by the design house of Fendi in 1996 Fendi Life Essence is classified as a sharp woody mossy fragrance. Top notes are coriander mandarin orange bergamot cardamom and lemo. Middle notes are cypress jasmine west indian bay and geranium. Base notes are sandalwood oakmoss and cedar. This unisex scent possesses a blend of oak moss and sandalwood.
